resources.string: Adaptive Multi-Rate Narrowband. Optimized for speech recording. AMR speech codec consists of a multi-rate narrowband speech codec that encodes narrowband (200–3400 Hz) signals at variable bit rates ranging from 4.75 to 12.2 kbit/s with toll quality (extracted from Wikipedia)

Adaptive Multi-Rate Wideband. Optimized for speech recording. Provides improved speech quality due to a wider speech bandwidth of 50–7000 Hz compared to narrowband speech coders (extracted from Wikipedia)
High–Efficiency Advanced Audio Coding (HE–AAC) is an audio coding format for lossy data compression of digital audio defined as an MPEG–4 Audio profile in ISO/IEC 14496–3(extracted from Wikipedia)
